original_text: Merari's descendants received 12 towns. The lots showed which towns they would receive. Their towns were in land that belonged to the tribes of Reuben, Gad and Zebulun.
korean_text: 므라리 자손에게는 그 종족대로 르우벤 지파와 갓 지파와 스불론 지파 중에서 제비 뽑아 열두 성읍을 주었더라

sentences.original_text: The lots showed which towns they would receive.
that belonged to the tribes of Reuben, Gad and Zebulun.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 르우벤, 갓, 스불론 지파에게 속해 있었습니다.
